item.description:
HI all - the MFA is hosting a free community day with entertainment. I'd love to go and see the new wing of the Americas and enjoy the Museum for free. Who would like to join me?

NEW DETAILS: The limit has been extended to 30.

The museum opens at 10 that day....We will meet at 10 a.m. in front of the gift shop (I will have a meetup sign) and, we will enjoy lunch in casual groups at our own paces at the Museum (there are several options) Please do not reply YES if you are a MAYBE. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet just outside the gift shop entrance.
item.name: Free Community Day at MFA (with lunch at the Museum) - Monday, January 17
